#summary Opcodes for miscellaneous instructions

=== Miscellaneous Instructions ===

==== S2R ====
Store special register to general-purpose register.

Template opcode:
{{{
0010 000000 1110 xxxxxx 000000 aaaaaaaa 00000000 00000000 00000000 110100
xxxxxx: destination reg
aaaaaa: 
	00000000: SR_WarpID;
	10100100: SR_CTAid_X;
	01100100: SR_CTAid_Y;
	11100100: SR_CTAid_Z;
	10000100: SR_Tid_X;
	01000100: SR_Tid_Y;
	11000100: SR_TID_Z;
	10001010: SR_Clock_Hi;
	00001010: SR_Clock_Lo;
	11000000: SR_VirtId;
	01000000: SR_VirtCfg;
	00110100: SR_GridParam;

Related dimensions:
c [0x0] [0x8] : %ntid.x
c [0x0] [0xc] : %ntid.y
c [0x0] [0x10]: %ntid.z
c [0x0] [0x14]: %nctaid.x
c [0x0] [0x18]: %nctaid.y
c [0x0] [0x1c]: %nctaid.z
BFE VirtId, 0x914 : %smid
BFE VirtCfg, 0x914: %nsmid

}}}
